list_definition.definition: to keep in the mind, or to bring back into the mind after forgetting for a time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I remember you – we met three years ago
I remember watching the first men landing on the moon
I don’t remember where I hid it.

list_definition.definition: to reward or make a present to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He remembered her in his will.

list_definition.definition: to pass (a person’s) good wishes (to someone)
